basics.name: Leslie Martin
basics.label:
Leslie is an Intuitive, Energy Healer & Spiritual Teacher. She supports clients to heal physically, emotionally, mentally & spiritually, addressing & shifting core issues intuitively & energetically, in accelerating greater well-being, health, & body, mind, spirit integration.

Leslie Martin
Reiki Master Teacher, Intuitive Consultant & Medium, Lightarian Reiki Institute Registered Facilitator, RMT

Self-Employed, 15 years' experience 
Reiki, Reiki Massage, Readings, Animal Communication, Astrology, Dream Interpretation, Numerology, Reiki Classes, Intuitive Workshops
Please contact me to book a session or to inquire about upcoming Reiki classes & Workshops...

Reiki...  Energy & Intuitive Healing Treatments with Channeled Guidance, Wellness & Holistic Coaching, Aura Clearing, Chakra Balancing; Animal Reiki; Distant Reiki; Reiki Massage

Readings...  Intuitive & Channeled Guidance, Wellness & Holistic Coaching- Angel, Medium, Tarot; Life Purpose & Past Life Astrology; Dream Interpretation; Life Path & Purpose Numerology; Animal Communication & Mediumship; Distant Readings

Traditional Usui Reiki Training Classes... Reiki I, II, III(Advanced) & Master Levels

Reiki I ; Learn to Self-heal
Reiki II ; Become a Reiki Practitioner; Emotional, Mental & Distance Healing
Reiki III (Advanced) ; Spiritual & Hara Line healing
Reiki Master Teacher Training
